summary:
-= MADE REDUNDANT BY OFFICIAL PATCH 1.9 =-
Fixes Riverwood Trader having 20 times the intended amount of gold with the Investor Perk.
descriptionHtml:
[color=red][size=40]MADE REDUNDANT BY OFFICIAL PATCH 1.9[/size][/color]
Bethesda finally got around to fixing this bug themselves ;)
As there's no script, I [i]believe[/i] you can just delete my ESP without any ill effects

===========
Description
===========
Fixes Riverwood Trader having 20 times the intended amount of extra gold with the Investor Perk - i.e. 10750 instead of 1250.

==============
Compatiblility
==============
Conflicts with any other mod that alters the Riverwood Trader inventory.

E.g. Midas Magic (Vendor Version)
author: Old Nick
